abstract: Mr. Nézet-Séguin, 39, began his tenure with the orchestra in 2012 and has won critical praise since then for his exuberant style.
snippet: Mr. Nézet-Séguin, 39, began his tenure with the orchestra in 2012 and has won critical praise since then for his exuberant style.

headline.main: Yannick Nézet-Séguin Extends Philadelphia Orchestra Contract
